name: Denny Hilguston
quote: I know in real-time where the money is spent,and I don’t have to lend out the company’s credit cardanymore. What a relief!

name: Vani Pandey
quote: VISUALS are much better. The improvements in optics and resolution and much more than a modern console generation leap.

name: milly Singh
quote: I can actually see the improvement in the graphics, not having the external sensors is a big plus.
